name: evm-input-data-decoder
description: Takes in the input of an EVM transaction, re-orders it into an object with a methodID and an array with each index of up to 64 characters. Then it can console log and return that object. Finally, it can search the object for a unique contract address using the wallet address as the argument variable.
author: Vadim Race (https://github.com/Git-Vdim-Hub)
